casebody.data:
May 6, 1968. No. 29,

Orig.

Texas et al. v. Colorado. Crawford C. Martin, Attorney General, for the State of Texas, Boston E. Witt, Attorney General, for the State of New Mexico, and Duke W. Dunbar, Attorney General, for the State of Colorado, on the joint motion. [For earlier orders herein, see, e. g., 390 U. S. 933.]

Motion of the United States for leave to intervene as plaintiff granted. Joint motion of Texas, New Mexico, and Colorado for continuance granted.

Mr. Justice Marshall took no part in the consideration or decision of these motions. Solicitor General Griswold on the motion for the United States.
